1.description: Reunited with Faile, now working to master his wolf abilities and deal with the responsibilities of leadership.

21.description: Enters the wolf dream to confront his past and master his abilities, facing the challenge of balancing man and wolf.

40.description: Successfully forges his war hammer, creating a weapon of Power that represents his mastery over his abilities.

8.description: Plans the rescue mission to the Tower of Ghenjei to save Moiraine, understanding the crucial importance of this task.

52.description: Successfully enters the Tower of Ghenjei with Thom and Olver to rescue Moiraine from the Aelfinn and Eelfinn.

57.description: Completes the rescue mission successfully, bringing Moiraine back to the world to fulfill her crucial role.

rand-althor.name: Rand al'Thor
aliases: He Who Comes With the Dawn

3.description: Now transformed and whole again, working to unite the nations for the Last Battle with renewed purpose and humanity.

25.description: Meets with various rulers to build alliances and prepare for the approaching Last Battle against the Shadow.

51.description: Continues his preparations while dealing with the complex political and military challenges of uniting the world.

3.description: Rules the reunited White Tower as the acknowledged Amyrlin Seat, working to heal the divisions and prepare for war.

25.description: Deals with the political complexities of leading the Tower while coordinating with other leaders for the Last Battle.

45.description: Continues to strengthen the Tower's position and prepare the Aes Sedai for their crucial role in the coming conflict.

8.description: Agrees to join Mat's mission to rescue Moiraine from the Tower of Ghenjei, driven by his love for her.

52.description: Enters the dangerous Tower of Ghenjei with Mat and Olver, facing the Aelfinn and Eelfinn to reach Moiraine.

57.description: Successfully helps rescue Moiraine and is reunited with the woman he loves after her long captivity.

8.description: Chosen to accompany Mat and Thom to the Tower of Ghenjei, carrying important items needed for the rescue.

52.description: Bravely enters the Tower of Ghenjei despite his young age, proving his courage and determination.

57.description: Successfully completes his part in the rescue mission, contributing to saving Moiraine from her captivity.

1.description: Reunited with Perrin after her captivity, now working to help him master his abilities and fulfill his destiny.

28.description: Provides counsel and emotional support as Perrin faces the challenges of leadership and wolf mastery.

53.description: Continues to stand by Perrin as he grows into his role as a leader preparing for the Last Battle.

57.description: Successfully rescued from the Tower of Ghenjei by Mat, Thom, and Olver after her long captivity with the Aelfinn and Eelfinn.

1.description: Rides toward his homeland of Malkier, gathering followers who believe in his cause and the restoration of his kingdom.

29.description: Continues his journey with growing numbers of supporters who wish to fight alongside the last king of Malkier.

53.description: Approaches the Blight with his army, preparing to face the Shadow in defense of his homeland and honor.

1.description: Worries about Lan's dangerous journey while using her position as Aes Sedai to help where she can.

23.description: Works with other Aes Sedai to support the various efforts being made in preparation for the Last Battle.

53.description: Continues to balance her duties as an Aes Sedai with her concern for Lan's mission and safety.

6.description: Undergoes the test to become a full Wise One, facing visions of possible futures that deeply disturb her.

48.description: Achieves full Wise One status while grappling with the troubling visions she experienced during her testing.

49.description: Uses her new authority as a Wise One to work toward preventing the dark futures she witnessed in her visions.

7.description: Rules Andor while heavily pregnant, dealing with the challenges of governing during preparation for war.

33.description: Gives birth to twins, fulfilling Min's viewing while strengthening her position as queen and mother.

45.description: Balances motherhood with royal duties while preparing Andor for its role in the approaching Last Battle.

3.description: Supports Rand in his renewed state, providing emotional stability while interpreting her viewings about the future.

25.description: Continues to provide counsel and emotional support while her viewings guide preparation for coming events.

51.description: Maintains her role as Rand's emotional anchor while understanding the approaching climax of their struggle.

3.description: Now serving Egwene as her Warder, having finally resolved his conflicted loyalties in her favor.

33.description: Learns of his sister's successful delivery of twins, balancing family joy with his duties to the Amyrlin.

45.description: Continues his protective duties while supporting Egwene in her preparations for the challenges ahead.

3.description: Observes Rand's transformation with satisfaction, understanding that her harsh methods helped achieve this crucial change.

25.description: Continues to advise Rand while adapting to his renewed humanity and changed approach to leadership.

51.description: Provides crucial guidance as the final preparations for the Last Battle reach their most critical stages.

7.description: Protects the heavily pregnant Elayne while managing the increased security needs of the royal household.

33.description: Assists during Elayne's delivery of twins, ensuring the safety of both queen and children during the birth.

45.description: Adapts her protection to cover both Elayne and her newborn twins while preparing for war duties.

2.description: Works to clean out corruption at the Black Tower, facing resistance and danger from those loyal to Taim.

30.description: Continues his efforts to restore the Black Tower to its proper purpose while building support among loyal Asha'man.

56.description: Makes significant progress in his campaign to cleanse the Black Tower of corruption and Shadow influence.

2.description: Rules the Black Tower with increasing corruption, promoting those who serve the Shadow while eliminating opposition.

30.description: Faces growing challenges to his authority as Logain and others work to expose and counter his corruption.

56.description: Finds his corrupt control of the Tower increasingly threatened by the forces of reform and justice.

2.description: An Asha'man with unusual talents, working quietly to support Logain's efforts to cleanse the Black Tower.

30.description: Proves increasingly valuable in the fight against corruption, using his unique skills to aid the reform efforts.

56.description: Plays a crucial role in the efforts to expose and eliminate the Shadow's influence within the Black Tower.

2.description: A Red Sister working to establish cooperation between the White Tower and Black Tower against Shadow influence.

30.description: Continues her dangerous mission to forge bonds between Red Sisters and Asha'man for the greater good.

56.description: Makes significant progress in building the alliances needed to cleanse both Towers of corruption.

5.description: Leads the Children of the Light with a reformed purpose, working to cleanse the organization of corruption.

34.description: Continues to reform the Whitecloaks while preparing them for their role in the fight against the Shadow.

47.description: Successfully transforms the Children into a force for genuine good rather than corruption and zealotry.

7.description: Supports her daughter Elayne in her rule while helping care for the royal household during the pregnancy.

33.description: Becomes a grandmother with the birth of Elayne's twins, taking joy in the new additions to the family.

45.description: Helps manage the royal household while Elayne balances motherhood with preparing for war.

3.description: Witnesses his son's renewal with relief and pride, understanding that Rand has found his way back to humanity.

32.description: Continues to provide paternal support and grounding for Rand as he prepares for his ultimate destiny.

51.description: Stands ready to support his son through the final challenges, representing the human connection that keeps Rand anchored.

21.description: A Great Captain of Arad Doman, working to defend his homeland while coordinating with other military leaders.

42.description: Demonstrates his tactical genius while preparing for the coordinated defense against the Shadow's forces.

50.description: Prepares his forces for the approaching Last Battle, understanding his crucial role in the world's defense.

1.description: Another of the Great Captains, working with his son-in-law Perrin while preparing for the Last Battle.

32.description: Coordinates military preparations while supporting both Perrin's growth and the larger war effort.

53.description: Finalizes preparations for the crucial battles ahead, using his expertise as one of the world's great military minds.

29.description: A Great Captain from Shienar, coordinating the defense of the Borderlands against the advancing Shadow.

42.description: Works with other Great Captains to develop the overall strategy for the Last Battle's military campaigns.

50.description: Completes his preparations for the Last Battle, ready to lead his forces in defense of the world.

3.description: Commands the Tower Guard and works with Egwene to integrate the reunited Tower's military capabilities.

25.description: Coordinates the Tower's military preparations while working with other Great Captains on overall strategy.

49.description: Finalizes the Tower's military readiness while maintaining his role as one of the world's greatest military leaders.

21.description: The Great Captain known as the Wolf, defending Arad Doman with brilliant tactics against overwhelming odds.

42.description: Demonstrates why he is considered one of the greatest military minds, adapting to changing battlefield conditions.

50.description: Prepares for his role in the Last Battle, understanding that his tactical genius will be crucial for victory.

recaps.1: Perrin reunites with Faile and begins mastering his wolf abilities while Lan gathers followers for his journey to Malkier.
recaps.2: The Black Tower faces internal conflict as Logain works to clean out corruption while Taim consolidates his Shadow-influenced control.
recaps.3: Rand, now transformed and whole, begins building alliances for the Last Battle while Egwene rules the reunited White Tower.
recaps.4: Various characters continue their preparations and personal journeys as the world prepares for the approaching final conflict.
recaps.5: Galad leads reformed Children of the Light while other leaders work to unite their forces against the coming darkness.
recaps.6: Aviendha undergoes the test to become a full Wise One, experiencing disturbing visions of possible futures for the Aiel.
recaps.7: Elayne rules Andor while heavily pregnant, supported by her mother Morgase and protected by Birgitte during this vulnerable time.
recaps.8: Mat plans the rescue mission to the Tower of Ghenjei to save Moiraine, understanding the crucial importance of this task.
recaps.9: The conflict at the Black Tower intensifies as reform and corruption forces clash while other storylines develop.
recaps.10: Perrin continues mastering his abilities while Faile provides support, and various other characters advance their goals.
recaps.11: Multiple storylines progress as characters prepare for their roles in the approaching Last Battle and final confrontations.
recaps.12: The Black Tower situation becomes more critical while other characters face their own challenges and responsibilities.
recaps.13: Rand continues building his alliance network while Egwene strengthens the Tower and other leaders make their preparations.
recaps.14: Perrin advances his wolf training while Galad continues reforming the Whitecloaks and other characters pursue their goals.
recaps.15: Aviendha grapples with her disturbing visions while Mat and Thom prepare for their dangerous rescue mission.
recaps.16: Elayne manages her royal duties during late pregnancy while various military and political preparations continue worldwide.
recaps.17: The Tower of Ghenjei mission preparations intensify while other characters face their own challenges and developments.
recaps.18: Perrin's growth continues while various other storylines advance as characters work toward their ultimate goals.
recaps.19: Mat's rescue mission planning reaches advanced stages while other characters face political and personal challenges.
recaps.20: The Black Tower conflict escalates while various other characters continue their preparations for the coming battles.
recaps.21: Perrin enters the wolf dream for crucial training while Ituralde demonstrates his tactical genius in defending his homeland.
recaps.22: Mat finalizes preparations for the Tower of Ghenjei while other characters face mounting pressures and responsibilities.
recaps.23: Political and military preparations continue as various leaders coordinate their efforts for the approaching Last Battle.
recaps.24: Elayne approaches childbirth while Perrin continues his wolf dream training and other characters advance their goals.
recaps.25: Rand continues alliance building while Egwene coordinates Tower efforts and other leaders finalize their preparations.
recaps.26: Various military and political developments occur as characters work toward resolution of their immediate challenges.
recaps.27: Multiple storylines progress as characters face crucial moments in their personal growth and preparation for war.
recaps.28: Perrin receives support from Faile in his development while other characters continue their various preparations.
recaps.29: Lan's gathering army grows while Agelmar coordinates Borderland defenses against the advancing Shadow forces.
recaps.30: The Black Tower conflict reaches new intensity while other characters make significant progress toward their goals.
recaps.31: Final preparations for the Tower of Ghenjei mission while other storylines approach critical junctures.
recaps.32: Multiple characters face crucial developments as political, military, and personal situations reach important points.
recaps.33: Elayne gives birth to twins while Gawyn learns of becoming an uncle, balancing family joy with duty.
recaps.34: Various storylines advance as characters work to complete their preparations and resolve immediate challenges.
recaps.35: Perrin's mastery continues to develop while other characters face the mounting pressure of approaching conflicts.
recaps.36: Political situations stabilize as various leaders complete their alliance building and preparation efforts.
recaps.37: Lan's journey continues while Nynaeve balances her worry for him with her duties as an Aes Sedai.
recaps.38: Perrin's growth reaches new stages while other characters finalize their readiness for the battles ahead.
recaps.39: The Black Tower situation intensifies further while various other storylines approach their resolution points.
recaps.40: Perrin successfully forges his power-wrought hammer while other characters achieve important milestones in their development.
recaps.41: Tower politics stabilize under Egwene's leadership while various other characters complete crucial preparations.
recaps.42: Military preparations reach advanced stages as the Great Captains coordinate overall strategy for the Last Battle.
recaps.43: Multiple storylines converge as characters complete their personal growth and preparation for the final conflict.
recaps.44: Perrin's mastery nears completion while other characters finalize their readiness for their roles in the coming war.
recaps.45: Elayne balances new motherhood with royal duties while other leaders complete their final preparations for battle.
recaps.46: Various conflicts and preparations reach critical stages as characters approach the culmination of their journeys.
recaps.47: Galad completes his reformation of the Children while other characters achieve final resolution of their immediate goals.
recaps.48: Aviendha achieves full Wise One status while grappling with the burden of her prophetic visions.
recaps.49: The reunited Tower reaches full strength while other organizations and leaders complete their final preparations.
recaps.50: Military preparations reach completion as the Great Captains finalize their strategies for the approaching Last Battle.
recaps.51: Final political and personal preparations occur as all major characters approach readiness for the ultimate conflict.
recaps.52: Mat, Thom, and Olver successfully enter the Tower of Ghenjei to begin their dangerous rescue mission.
recaps.53: Lan approaches the Blight with his army while Perrin completes his transformation into a master of his abilities.
recaps.54: The Tower of Ghenjei mission continues as the rescue team faces the dangers of the Aelfinn and Eelfinn realm.
recaps.55: The rescue mission faces its greatest challenges as Mat, Thom, and Olver navigate the twisted realm of the Tower.
recaps.56: Significant progress occurs in the Black Tower conflict while the Tower of Ghenjei mission reaches its climax.
recaps.57: Mat, Thom, and Olver successfully rescue Moiraine from her captivity, bringing her back to fulfill her crucial role in the Last Battle.
